Comment: Oh. Well EU signed an agreement with MERCOSUR last year. Canada is knocking the door after the tariffs and Mexico has always been a EU partner for certain products. The prices US pays for fruit and vegetables are almost double of what most Europeans countries pay. I was involved in international trade for 17 years and US has always been the most important market because they are willing to pay more. For example a bag of coffee in Spain will cost you 1.50 euros in any supermarket. The same bag in Walmart USA will cost you $6. I'm talking about the exact same product. There is a nonsense abput how much Americans are willing to pay for products.
